text: Anata gataga nani-sho ni ite mo, tatoe kengona kōrō ni ite mo, shi wa kanarazu yattekuru. Kare-ra wa kōun ni aeba,`koreha arrā no omoto karada.' To ii, mata sainan ni aeba,`kore wa anata (muhanmado) karada.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Issai wa arrā no omoto karadearu.' Ittai kono hito-tachi wa dō shita nodearou ka. (Don'na) kotoba mo hotondo rikai shinai no ka
